Welcome!

Services

Hello! I'm Designer in the Mid-Atlantic region specializing in educational and higher ed design.
After a ten-year immersion in print, I've returned to web development!
Jekyll looked unique, refreshing and offered lots of tutorials and beautiful templates like this one.

Print and Production

Already have a designed project and need to hand it off to get bids, printing and finishing? I can manage your project. Or want to know more? See my prepress class materials

Design and Illustration

Need help from the concept phase? I can help design and implement your project from start to print and beyond.

Web Design

Want a site designed for web and mobile?
